name: Gardulla The Hutt
Lore: 'Well-known as a gambler and a gangster. Gardulla was a former owner of Shmi and Anakin Skywalker, before losing them in a bet to the Toydarian junk dealer, Watto.',
Text: 'When you retrieve Force from Boonta Eve Podrace, any or all of your retrieved Force may be taken into hand. Once during your control phase, may use 1 Force; opponent draws one destiny. If destiny > 2, you retrieve 1 Force. Otherwise, lose 1 Force.',
